cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 275 miles SW of Port-au-Prince, Haiti
cyclone.trajectory: Moving northward across Haiti/eastern Cuba then through the Bahamas and forecast to skirt just offshore the Florida east coast toward Georgia–South Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: nearest coastal encounter expected just offshore the northeast Florida coast near Jacksonville

weather_observation.watch_coast: None issued for Florida yet (watches confined to Jamaica, Cuba, Bahamas, Hispaniola)
weather_observation.warning_coast: None issued for Florida yet (warnings confined to Jamaica, Cuba, Bahamas, Hispaniola)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire Florida east coast northward through Georgia and the Carolinas lies within the day-4/5 cone
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm-force winds possible (16% chance); low (4%) chance of 50-kt winds late Thu–Fri
weather_observation.storm_surge: Potential 3–6 ft surge along the northeast Florida coast if the center tracks close to shore
weather_observation.rainfall: 4–6 inches of rain with locally higher amounts possible Friday into Saturday
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents; possible river flooding inland
